item.title: Gardener 1.3.0 Released
item.description: Gardener 1.3.0 Released See what’s new and noteworthy presented by the team on the regular community meeting recording. Bookmark the agenda for upcomming community meetings and stay up to date with what’s going on in the project. Enjoy!
